author: donaldp
msg: Remove Feature: Use old config file name server.xml
SAR-INF/server.xml was renamed to SAR-INF/environment.xml because phoenix and
this configuration was not specific to servers but to the environment in

author: donaldp
msg: Remove Feature: Using elements named "block-listener" in assembly.xml
The correct element name is <listener/> now so as not to
confuse differences between Block and Applicaiton

author: donaldp
msg: Make sure that the work directory uses name of application not name of sarfile.
